AttackerCapabilities: Ability to analyze network traffic (pcap files)

Steps.Description: Analyzing the HTML code of the page

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that there might be an authentication mechanism in the HTML code.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker analyzes the HTML code of the page to look for any authentication mechanisms.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker discovers that there is no authentication mechanism implemented.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that there might be additional web pages accessible through the network traffic.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker analyzes the network traffic captured in the pcap file.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker discovers a network request for https://freewifi.ctf.umbccd.io/staff.html.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that the flag might be present on the discovered web page.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker accesses the discovered web page at https://freewifi.ctf.umbccd.io/staff.html.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker finds the flag on the web page.
